capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's possessions, and it seems like he has a pretty interesting collection. I mean, who wouldn't want to own a three-headed dog? It's definitely not something you see every day. Luwei is such an unusual name for a pet, don't you think?
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of you before, valeria, but i'm so excited to learn more about hagrid   who is he?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hunters' teeth, you say? Well, I can confirm that Hagrid does have a few of those in his collection. It's not surprising, really - he's always been quite fascinated by magical creatures and their habitats. I mean, who wouldn't want to learn more about the creatures that live in the Forbidden Forest? But, yes, I'm certain that Hagrid has those teeth on display somewhere in his hut.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of teeth do the hunters in valeria have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just reading about Minerva McGonagall and it's amazing to think that she's an adult now. I mean, can you believe it? She's still teaching Transfiguration at Hogwarts and looking as sharp as ever. I'm sure she's doing a fantastic job, given her experience and expertise.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of professor mcgonagall before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall is doing a fantastic job as the Vice-President of Hogwarts. I've seen her in action, and she's always been very fair and just. She's got a lot of experience, you know, having been on the staff for so long, and it really shows in the way she leads the school.
